Thinking about my highlights of this year, and New York was definitely one of them. Another was releasing @filmmapp with @abeautifulmess (@elsielarson & @emmaredvelvet) & then yesterday releasing our second app @templateapp with the same incredible team! It’s available to download now and has everything you’d ever need to get creative with your video and images! (Link is in my bio or on my stories at time of posting this) I’ve already seen so many amazing collages created with the app & we’re all so grateful for your fabulous feedback so far 💫 .
.
.
And as I’m anticipating a lot of questions about it, for the android users, the team are focusing all their efforts in completing the long awaited filmm release before looking into doing Template! Building for android is a much more lengthy process, but we’re not far away from launching filmm for Android now! 🙌🏼

We were definitely laughing at the fact we don’t know how to pose for photos as a couple in this moment 🧡 The incredible @brandonwoelfel did a little shoot with us in NYC & I love them! Thank you Brandon, you are a photographic magician! 💫✨

When you aren’t supposed to be in the photo, but very much are. 😂👏🏼 @joe_sugg was too good not to crop out. Spot him in all 4 photos for Christmas kudos. .

When the jet lag hits 😴 @zachlower took this the other night & there is so much about this photo that makes me laugh. The fact I’m actually cuddling alfies foot and that it’s CREASING my forehead, alfies stray leg, my little toes on his arm & the left over late night McDonald’s delivery on the table. I always struggle so much coming here, but am absolutely fine once I get home! How do you combat jet lag? ✈️

Obsessed with this circular room in the @wburghotel! 👏🏼 LAST DAY TODAY!!! So I’m checking my list for what we still need to see/do in the last few hours that we’re here. I’ve actually LOVED exploring New York this week, even though there’s been a lot of rain! 🧡

Raise your hand if you’ve ever actually been able to eat two scoops of @cookiedonyc in one sitting? This lasted me DAYS before I gave up ?? So good though! Favourite flavour is definitely cake batter ??

When both your partners have to work so you get to run around the city exploring! We stumbled into @roughtradenyc and popped into the photo booth to give them both a little present... us. 😂

Decorating the tree ~ Filmm 2.0

Super excited to say that Filmm 2.0 is finally here! The goal for Filmm was always to be able to film videos on your phone, use amazing filters and effects and then create an entire video within the app itself. The ability to put clips together along with a whole load of amazing transitions is NOW AVAILABLE in the app! (As well as still being able to edit single videos too). I edited this entire video on my phone just using @filmmapp! Last week it reached 1 million downloads and it makes me so happy to see so many of you creating beautiful videos with it, thank you so much for all the support! I feel like this is going to step up my Instagram video game (and it’s just so bloomin’ easy to use). For all the android users out there, fear not, it’s looking likely that filmm will be released in January but will keep you updated! It’s been a much harder process than it was for IOS so the team are working super hard to get it all done for you! 💪🏼

I recommend using a new sock! This hack is super cool! Has anyone tried it?! Washing beauty blenders in a washing machine by @keshiaeast_
___________________________________
1️⃣ Get all your used beauty sponges
2️⃣ Pop them in a black sock (you don’t want to stain your other socks). Tie the end of the sock with a band.
3️⃣ Put them into your washing machine. (With your usual detergent)
4️⃣ Voila! Good as new 💁🏽‍♀️

Thank you so much to the @streamys- The Oscars of @youtube...for giving me a reason to get all extra fancy.
And thank you to @michaelcostello for making me this beautiful dress, with fun fringe on the arm, to twirl around in.
I sat there feeling so honored, not just that I won a Streamy last year, but just knowing I have been able get messages from around the world saying lil’ ol’ me was able to touch someone’s life or just make someone’s day feel brighter- that it the greatest reward of Youtube, to my heart. The world and life can feel hard, lonely, sad, overwhelming or hopeless...and I always hope I can be a little sparkle of hope, encouragement & love to each of you, to help make your heart feel loved & encouraged💖✨
I really am looking forward to sharing my life update of why I haven’t uploaded a video in almost a year...(it’s been much harder to make than I thought) and I hope it inspires someone or makes someone feel that they weren’t alone if they were feeling or going through the same things I was...stay tuned for when that will be out✨

When you get your hair and makeup done and it still looks so good at the end of the night, that you don’t even want to wash it off, so you take this picture to remember😂 HAIR: @petermazilu (who is amazing and whipped my hair into perfect “modern vintage glam” so fast!) LEOPARD OUTFIT I’M OBSESSED WITH: @vintagevandalizm
And thank you to the @ogx_beauty team that wanted me to feel like a princess for their Holiday Party where I got to announce to the guest I have my NEW LINE with them coming in January, so they said they have me pampered with hair & makeup I didn’t have to do myself!🙈❤️ Sparkles in my eyes😂: my new @stellarlightingsystems light
MAKEUP BY: @muaroni - you Guys I was staring at my skin because he made it looked photoshopped in real life! I had to ask what he used:

6 THINGS...
1️⃣This girl, 12-13 years ago, was defeated by life, felt that all hope was gone, had been a freelance makeup artist for years but lived somewhere where makeup wasn’t needed, lived through some pretty awful situations and had less than a dollar in the bank. If you are feeling like I did back then, please be encouraged, because I was there too!
2️⃣Back then I NEVER, EVER, EVER could’ve imagined I would be on a shoot like we had the other day...(🙈I can’t believe and it still sounds “too fancy” to even say MY COLLECTION) with @ogx_beauty
3️⃣They built a 26,000 pound pool, had multiple sets, and a huge crew just like I used to be a part of as “makeup”. 4️⃣Yesterday, instead of being the makeup artist, I got to be talent and have @paintedbyspencer do my makeup beautifully like this
If anyone is wondering, he used: @kyliecosmetics lip color in: 💋- “Poise K”liquid lip & “Sweet” high gloss
🏝”caramel hoola” bronzer from @benefitcosmetics &
@anastasiabeverlyhills brow whiz in soft brown
THEN
@chadwoodhair gave me perfect glam waves & even @drgaberosenthal gave me extra tooth whiteness 😂✨
5️⃣And @ogx_beauty believed in me enough to offer me this “real” KANDEE Pop💋Glam Line!
6️⃣And Target, Ulta, Walmart, CVS, Walgreen’s & outlets in Canada, believed in it so much they all chose to carry it too!🙈😭🙈
My little heart is so honored, grateful & just can’t believe it! I hope you all love it!

🙈 I AM SO EXCITED I finally get to tell you! From the girl that years ago, couldn’t see anything good in her future, was a single mom, had no idea how she was going to pay rent & had 7 cents in her bank account...I am beyond grateful, honored & excited I get to share this with you and hope it gives you hope to not give up, even if you can’t imagine anything good up ahead, I didn’t either and look what I get to share with you!🙈 After 2 years of working on this with @ogx_beauty and after I did their very first collaboration with anyone, 3 years ago, for my holiday Shampoo & Conditioner scents I created!
I can’t believe I get to announce that they asked me to create my own collection with them, OGX KANDEE Pop💋Glam, that will be on store shelves everywhere January 2020!!! It will be in Target, Walmart, CVS, Walgreen’s and more!
I never would’ve believed, years ago, that an amazing opportunity & blessing like this would be in my life. We worked hard and went through so many fragrance notes, to tweak change and get just the perfect “edible” scent! 😂 It’s all the essential hair products I need & use: The HUGS Shampoo & KISSES Conditioner that is ultra-hydrating and perfect for color-treated hair to prevent fading and leave hair super hydrated & smelling amazing. Then I use dry shampoo all the time, so I wanted the perfect dry shampoo, Mermaid Dust Dry Shampoo, to style with, use to freshen hair and make it smell like people want to know “what perfume your hair is wearing”. And last but not least, the Mermaid Mask Deep Conditioning Hair Mask, to leave your hair mermaid level hydrated, smooth, detangled and smelling like heaven-under-the-sea!
The fragrance notes are all my favs: Juicy pineapple🍍, creamy coconut 🥥 & cotton candy! It’s a treat for your senses & your hair! I made sure it smells soooooo good! This line was created with the most awesome team of amazing people at @ogx_beauty that’s filled with so much care, thought, attention to detail & I hope this makes your shower smell like a vacation or treat, because I know some days can be hard & just a shower that smells good is your only relaxation time ! I hope it’s your new favorites!

Do you wear squat shoes? 👟 Tag a friend & read this 👉🏾 If like me you prefer full range reps when you squat, be sure to take into consideration, the ability to perform this with comfort will rely heavily on the footwear you are wearing. ⁣
⁣
If you’ve followed me for long enough you will have seen many of my squat videos, in which you will no doubt have seen I always wear squat shoes. The reason for this that they raise my heel, so that my ankle has to perform less dorsiflexion when I reach the bottom of a squat. ⁣
⁣
Squatting ATG without heel elevation is a far more difficult (and uncomfortable) task. Today I forgot my squat shoes 🤦🏾‍♂️ however I was able to improvise and create the heel elevation I needed for deep squats. ⁣
⁣
Due to the short width of the wedge I used, I had to adopt a narrower stance than I typically would for conventional squats, close stance squats are more challenging so I kept the weight and reps lower than usual. ⁣
⁣
👟 Do you wear squat shoes?⁣

You’d be forgiven for assuming a fitness photo shoot is an easy affair, however you’d be completely off the mark. ⁣
⁣
Whilst it may look easy just posing for a photo, when you are working with ‘real weights,’ (not all fitness photo shoots use real weights) posing for each exercise can be just as taxing as performing the workout. In fact, sometimes you are indeed required to perform the reps, over and over, wait hold (mid rep) a little lower, ok keep going annnd rest 😅 ⁣
⁣
Essentially a fitness photo shoot can be the equivalent of a 6hr isometric workout, ‘Isometric...what’s that?’ Isometric is a term given to any exercise involving a static contraction. For example, think of holding dumbbells at the end of the concentric phase of a lateral raise, if you were to keep them up without lowering them, you would be performing an isometric exercise. ⁣
⁣
Just thought I would give you an insight into the ins and outs of a fitness photo shoot. ⁣
⁣
Shout to @innosupps Inno Shred helped me get super lean for this shoot 🔥⁣
⁣

One of my FAVOURITE meals is Yemista, which is a Greek stuffed vegetable. You can do it many different ways and there are many variations on this dish depending on where in the world you come from. There are a few vegetables you can use to make this dish, my family will often use zucchini (courgette), tomato, capsicum or eggplant (aubergine). The key to ensuring the vegetables don't dry out in the oven is to tip a cup of water in the oven tray with your veg. This is a great, well-rounded dish for any vegetarians or vegans too, full of rice and other healthy, hearty ingredients, plus you can season it to your tastes with any herbs and spices you like!!⁣
⁣
Photo credit: @rebelrecipes

Now that I am BACK home in Adelaide, I am allll about the breakfast. 😁 One thing I noticed when I was travelling is how different the breakfast options are when you’re eating out. We have a huge breakfast culture in Australia and it’s a meal we’ll often have at a cafe or restaurant with friends or family - our chefs are SO creative with breakfast menus.⁣
I find when I’m travelling the only options are often bacon and eggs… and sometimes I actually want some greens for breakfast, which I know other people might find a bit odd haha. 😂 So my go-to options while travelling were omelettes with lots of vegetables, avocado toast (I sometimes ask for a poached egg as well), or a green salad… and don’t judge me but I also packed some Vegemite and just ordered toast and butter a couple of times. The waiters looked at me like “what?” and then out came the jar of Vegemite! 😬⁣
⁣
Photo credit: @misscleanliving

Cake Moment #2: Surprise Sprinkles!⁠
⁠
Okay slicing into a cake is already so satisfying but when there are surprise sprinkles?? Well that just takes the cake! 😅⁠
⁠
To create these sprinkled up secret chambers, I began by using circle cutters (which you can find on @howtocakeit) to cut out an even hole from the center of each cake layer. After stacking my cakes up (with buttercream), I then fill the secret chamber with sprinkles - but you can really fill it with any fun surprise! Once your chamber is full, add a final layer of cake on top with no hole in and voila! You have a cake with a fun secret chamber. This is an awesome way to add some extra fun to literally any cake 😊 Have you guys tried making secret chambers before? What did you fill them up with? 🤔⁠

A colourful line-up of @theshmeemobiles to end 2019 and the decade! This 10 year period has been beyond a dream for me and it's a huge thanks to everyone who has been part of the adventures. Never did I think when I uploaded my first YouTube video in January 2010 that 10 years later I'd be fortunate enough to own these kind of cars and doing things like taking 6 of my cars around Europe on Where's Shmee, to flying my Ford GT over to the USA and travelling across the country. Every year I cannot believe what I've been lucky enough to do and it already looks like the new decade has plenty in store. It's a Happy New Year to everybody and may you have a successful and prosperous 2020! Thank you for your support

It's been a while since we saw my 675LT Spider on the channel, but today a garage update is coming with @theshmeemobiles and explaining why exactly the purple Mac hasn't been out recently. Plus there's news on all the new cars to come including the M8 Competition, A45 S, Griffith, GT R Roadster and GT500
What a spec on @ferraridrive's 599 GTO that I drove in California! The colour is Vinaccia with gold wheels, something very unique and stunning in the sunshine

It's a small change, but the orange calipers on my Focus RS Heritage Edition fit so much better in my eyes than the unpainted silver ones. These are new replacement parts installed by @dub_customs so I've kept the stock ones for future originality, but in the mean time it looks awesome!

Can you spot the changes that have been made to my AMG GT R Pro at @dub_customs? Small but significant little touches while visiting to collect my Heritage RS that's now wearing orange calipers as well as revealing my Christmas present from my girlfriend. All this and more in my latest video, but now out for some drives in the coming days with the Pro!

Stopped by @bugatti to check out the Centodieci! They are only making 10 units at €9m each, paying tribute in the 110th anniversary year of Bugatti to the EB110 from the 90s. It launched at The Quail in summer, but can't wait to see what else Bugatti have up their sleeves for 2020

Where shall I take these two of @theshmeemobiles on their first long trip together? Using the G63 as the towing machine of course! Maybe up to Scotland, a run to the Nürburgring when it opens in Spring, all the way to Portimao... options!

Driving @zencardriver's new 718 Cayman GT4! It makes me miss my old 981, but really interesting to experience the similarities and differences of yet another cracking car from Porsche. This one has just 21 miles on the clock so an absolute privilege to take it out, thank you @zencardriver

The one modification I always wanted to make on my Focus RS Heritage Edition is now underway at @dub_customs! A new set of matching orange calipers are being fitted to replace the unpainted silver ones that never really matched in my eyes and will improve the look of the limited edition RS

An early Christmas present! Fitted luggage set for my Senna from @schedoni_official in the matching Alcantara and MSO Cerulean Blue stitching with #281 embroidery plus a collaboration with @sparco_official for the race suit to go with my helmet from @mclarenmanchester! Back to the track in 2020 I think...

New winter shoes for my GTC4Lusso! For the trips ahead, the car is prepared with a set of winter tyres, while the summer ones are stored by my dealer @meridienmodena until the spring. This is part of the service available with UK @ferrari dealerships to store the summers during winter, and winters during summer, and in the case of mine it's due a service in April which will fit to swap them back around. By my logic, it's a 4WD practical car and that means perfect to chase the snow!
Over a year in the making, and now together in the garage for the first time! @theshmeemobiles in Cerulean Blue

It's finally home time for my Senna! It's been a long process to ensure @theshmeemobiles flagship car goes back onto the road in exactly the same shape it was. I couldn't have asked for more than the work carried out by @chartwell_derby working with @mclarenauto to get it right through the painstaking process of investigation, parts manufacturing, MSO paintwork, assembly, calibration and ultimately shakedown. Of course for the collection day it had to be the matching G63 in action with @turbotransport and the trailer. Bring on 2020; better weather and many fun adventures and drives ahead in the Senna!

Well there wasn't any other way we'd go to collect my Senna, was there?! Taking the G63 with @turbotransport to head up for collection and to bring it back home to the garage. This will only be the second time the two Cerulean Blue beasts have been together, the first being the unfortunate day back in July

Pro by night! Not many opportunities yet to get the newest member of @theshmeemobiles out but that will all come in time with big adventures planned ahead. Thanks to @azk.photography for snapping it while I was finding out about what's changed from my earlier pre-facelift GT R
No shortage of stunning cars at @auto_vivendi including the beautiful Lava Red example of the Vanquish Zagato Shooting Brake

@auto_vivendi are one of the very first to add the new McLaren GT to their collection so I had to pop over and check it out. Having owned a few McLarens now and driven pretty much all of them, I'm curious what the GT is all about and whether it makes sense in the line-up. Tell you what though, how epic is this garage?!

This was 12 months ago collecting my Senna at @mclarenmanchester which is going to be a deja vu in a few days collecting it again, for the second Christmas in a row! It feels like a brand new addition to @theshmeemobiles all over again

My Red RS is back! It's been at @mountune for a while during the time I've been away and finally I've gone to collect it and bring it back to @theshmeemobiles garage. A look into the next modifications in my new video on the channel!

Getting a taster of the Senna during shakedown reminded me how raw this car actually is! Not long now until it returns to @theshmeemobiles garage, just the final prep and sign-off before the long wait is over. And yes, the size of that wing will never make sense!

Shakedown time for my Senna! Soon to return to the garage with @theshmeemobiles but first it'll have a full test to run through the paces and ensure everything is correct; from ESC and wing movements to rattles and driving feel. This is carried out by the McLaren team at @millbrook.official using the purpose built facility. You'll notice it is running on temporary silver shakedown wheels fitted with Pzero tyres that are much more appropriate than the track Trofeo R ones on my normal Dark Stealth set. Huge thanks to those who made it possible to join and cover this day!

The new beast has joined the line-up and I'm very close to finding a new home for @theshmeemobiles to live for 2020. It's going to be a busy year ahead as always, just looking forward to some good opportunities to drive the Pro as the UK weather at the moment is non stop grim. Onwards though, this car needs to hit the track

Visiting @jaylenosgarage was an amazing experience and also a huge inspiration. Jay's knowledge and passion shone brightly but also the vast collection of memorabilia, artworks, and automotive pieces that line the halls of the warehouses. I'm getting closer to my dream unit (or 'Shmuseum') and might have some news before too long

In a way there's a similarity between these three of @theshmeemobiles but they are also very different. All have a big engine up front and could sit comfortable in the sports-GT category, but then we're mixing V8s and V12s, NA and turbo, manual and DCT, RWD and 4WD. I'm always keen on cars that serve slightly different purposes and experiences when you take them out and you certainly get that from this trio

Look what's home! My AMG GT R Pro is now fully complete with PPF installed by @topazdetailing and set for the adventures ahead. Now if only the weather forecast for this week wasn't rain every single day! Like all the other @theshmeemobiles, it won't be a garage queen but I'd definitely prefer to enjoy those early miles while getting the run in complete before trips ahead to the Nürburgring and beyond. For the time being there's one thing though about this car that's rather different to the others...

All done! My AMG GT R Pro is now completed at @topazdetailing with full coverage PPF and the Piano Black Stripes installed to fit the theme. Time for a first drive coming up and welcoming the newest member of @theshmeemobiles to the garage

My Senna is in some pretty good company at @topazdetailing with a Senna GTR beside! Both cars are getting PPF installed, meanwhile my GT R Pro is nearly finished and should be ready for the first drive tomorrow, armed with new stripes. However, I'm beyond excited to pick up the Senna again in the not too distant future and get it back on the roads

My Senna has arrived back at @topazdetailing! It won't be long now until it's all done and back in my garage. The Cerulean Blue beast is fully fixed up, now for the detailing and new PPF, then it will go for a final shakedown and quality control with the factory before I take delivery again in a few weeks

My Pro is stripeless for now, but watch this space...! When the @topazdetailing PPF is installed we'll be making a subtle change, plus that might not be the only surprise today. This sounds mysterious but I'm really looking forward to sharing the video later on featuring another long awaited Shmeemobile...

With a new garage coming soon, the perfect centrepiece had to be a bespoke @amalgamcollectionmodels 1:8 Senna to match the spec of my actual car! Consisting of 1,000 pieces and the actual factory paint, I went to take a look at the work in progress. If you know my love for replica models to match @theshmeemobiles from the past and present, you'll know how much I've always looked forward to buying my first model from Amalgam Collection, and now it's on the way.

This Aventador SVJ Roadster is looking unbelievable at @topazbristol! My first visit to check out the Bristol unit and I'm greeted by the brand new SVJ of @michelle_steve_82w that stands out a mile away, what a car

These are the secret @mercedesbenz halls housing the collection of the @mercedesbenzmuseum with road cars, racecars, F1 winners, the DTM history, and many concepts and test cars! Join me for exclusive access to tour some of the amazing rooms housing these incredible cars in my latest video
My two beasts together before the Pro went in to @topazdetailing for PPF! It's going to be out on the roads soon, can't wait for the first drive

After the best wash it'll ever have, the GT R Pro is masked up at @topazdetailing for the machine polishing and enhancing stages to begin. This is all about perfecting the paint quality before it is locked in underneath the PPF that will be installed next, ready to protect from stonechips and the like during the adventures ahead

Under the snow foam lies an AMG GT R Pro! The new Shmeemobile starts the process at @topazdetailing with a proper wash before the detail and then ultimately the installation of Paint Protection Film. Really looking forward to the team working their magic and having it ready for a first drive!

The speed with which time passes can sometimes take you by surprise, and the fact that my Vantage GT8 is now 3 years old, has done exactly that to me! Despite it being winter, the @gt8.club met up in London with a great line-up including other cars too, and an opportunity to get it out for a drive after the recent mishap in the garage where the battery had gone.

Locked and loaded! Having the GT R Pro safely loaded up thanks to the help of @turbotransport in his trailer, step 1 was to tow it myself over to @topazdetailing ahead of PPF installation. Now it's a week or so of waiting for the work to be done and then it'll be time to drive!

IT'S FINALLY HERE! I've collected my brand new AMG GT R Pro in Diamond White with grey stripes and titanium wheels. To transport it from @mercedesbenzbrentford to @topazdetailing for PPF, my G63 has become the ultimate towing machine thanks to the trailer and expertise of @turbotransport! I am super pleased to finally pick up the new member of @theshmeemobiles and look forward to the adventures ahead
Check out this SLS AMG Black Series that's just arrived at @alainclassmotors in Magno Alanite Grey - what a spec, makes me think!

Now this Ford GT is driven properly! I popped by the @dubaiautodrome and jumped on board for some hot laps in a car that has seen a lot of track action, huge respect to the owner! I may not have brought my car out to the middle east (this time!) but great to enjoy a blast around the circuit.

Need a picnic table? There's a nice one here on the @zyrusengineering LP1200! Helping to produce 1,300kg of downforce, the entire body is their own work and plays by no rules to make the most extreme car they could. From my experience, extreme is an understatement

Have you ever seen a crazier 'car' than the @zyrusengineering LP1200?! I'm taking this 1,200hp, 1,200kg, >1,200kg downforce mad machine out on @dubaiautodrome to experience what it's like, what is this?! Time to hold on tight...

Checking out @fa9ool63's beastly Mercedes C63 AMG Black Series in the stunning AMG Solarbeam paintwork! There can't be that many produced in this option and it suits the car so well, what an amazing colour and what a character from this car thanks to near headers, downpipe and even more power

I'm holding the world's most expensive and exclusive car key! This is the €500,000 Phantom @awainkey with 34.50 cts of diamond and made from solid white gold, that just so happens to be linked to the Bugatti Chiron at @thecarvaultdubai - check it out in my latest video!

Not long until the latest addition to @theshmeemobiles garage arrives! My AMG GT R Pro is ready and set for collection back in the UK, stay tuned this Saturday 7th December for the reveal when I'm home to pick it up! In the meantime, a 'plate reveal' of SH60 MEE that I've chosen this time around for the new car, 60 = GO GO GO. Follow @theshmeemobiles for the first pictures!
What an experience with the Aston Martin One-77 Q Series from @vipmotorsuae - without a doubt one of the most beautiful and best sounding cars of all time

I drove the One-77 Q Series! Thanks to @vipmotorsuae I got the opportunity to get behind the wheel of one of the most beautiful cars ever. The Aston Martin One-77 was a run of 77 cars, of which only 7 were Q Series models with unique touches to them. It has a stonking 7.3l naturally aspirated V12 producing 750hp and yes it sounds fantastic. Was it the best Aston Martin I've ever driven? Video live now on the channel with all the details and my drive experience
